title: Is that even possible? My 4 League accounts got hacked
body: It says "username or password is incorrect". But there are diffrent passwords on each account...

replies.body: No worries! We just noticed that we were having issues with our login servers. We're currently on top of it, and you can keep updated on our [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)!
It seems this is an authentication problem on RIOTs side. Don't trip :D
if your trying to log in right now there is some problem not letting anyone on your probably safe its riot that is failing right now

> [{quoted}](name=hammer3,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YlFqMhER,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-14T22:43:23.742+0000)
